Articles.Content:
Hello

I've recently installed ksp on a new and better pc than before, but i have a glitch, whatever key i assign (i have also tried to assign a mouse button or a joystick one), the orbital map won't show up, i have the glitch on 64 bit and 32 bit ksp and my install is unmodded, what can i do?

Thank you for the answers

KSP 0.90 (last update)

Windows 8.1, Intel I7 4710hq , 8 gb ram, GTX 860m

Edited January 20, 2015 by TheKutKu

Can you still click with the mouse on the light-blue orbital map button (shown here in the picture to the bottom right)?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/2/2e/Docking_lin.png
Yes, it shows the orbital map, but the keyboard don't.
It could be a bad settings.cfg, if you delete it KSP will make a new one.
It works!! Thank you for helping me!
